column3: Will you regularly contribute signatures? I haven't seen you around before
Relatively new to this build process; I will contribute signatures regularly

We could wait with merging this until we have a couple of signatures from @willyko.\n\nBut every gitian build/sig is valuable... having the keys here in this repository makes things easier to verify and the integrity of the keys is sort-of protected in a signed-data-chain (gitian signatures of the tarbal which includes the keys to verify future versions).
I've verified that the signatures contributed in https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gitian.sigs/pull/619 verify with this key.

After discussion on IRC with @fanquake I'm just going to merge this, we can always remove keys again if people stop building for a long time. But at the moment it's not an issue, it's not like we have so many git builders in the first place, everyone is welcome.\nutACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11700/commits/f88d9003546607763810024faad3bbc3b8cf1def
